word: To us the invitation is given, "Come out from among them, and be ye separate, . . . and I will receive you, and will be a father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty" (2 Corinthians 6:17, 18). Thus God has declared His covenant of obedience.--Letter 79, May 10, 1900, to a gracious businessman and his Adventist wife.
